subject: Stadiums and Arenas
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: The Astrodome was once the most important and influential stadium in America. But, in what would be a betrayal of Houston’s greatness and of dreamers everywhere, it may be torn down.
snippet: The Astrodome was once the most important and influential stadium in America. But, in what would be a betrayal of Houston’s greatness and of dreamers everywhere, it may be torn down.
